meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lori Cain Ethan Dougherty Katie Sowder Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6106.

td.p: Lori Cain, an insurance claims investigator from Altamont, New York
Ethan Dougherty, a journalist from Chicago, Illinois
Katie Sowder, a freelance researcher from Kansas City, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,900)

tr.td: LET'S GO ONLINE
OLYMPIC TRACK & FIELD RECORDS
HABLA ESPANOL?
DUMB CRIMINALS
WE ARE THE WOLVES
WE ARE THE CHILDREN

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
